If point $(900,155)$ is removed, which of the following statements is TRUE?

choices.text: The slope of the least squares regression line decreases and the correlation decreases.
The slope of the least squares regression line decreases and the correlation increases.
The slope of the least squares regression line increases and the correlation decreases.
The slope of the least squares regression line increases and the correlation increases.
The slope of the least squares regression line increases and the correlation stays the same.
